author: Andy Pearson
method: Place the gin, Earl Grey tea, lemon juice, sugar syrup and egg white into a cocktail shaker and shake well. Double strain the liquid into a Martini glass and garnish with a lemon twist.
ingredients: 50ml/2fl oz gin ,  35ml/1½fl oz strong cold Earl Grey tea ,  20ml/¾fl oz lemon juice ,  12.5ml/½fl oz sugar syrup (sold as 'gomme' syrup),  ½ free-range egg white ,  twist lemon peel, to garnish
